name: Peacekeeper Training
uniques: Can build [Emplacement] improvements on tiles <if it hasn't used other actions yet>

name: Keeper of the Oath
uniques: Prevents spreading of religion to the city it is next to

name: Aquaponics Kit
uniques: Can instantly construct a [Aquaponics Area] improvement <by consuming this unit>

name: ARK Construction
uniques: Can instantly construct a [ARK District] improvement <by consuming this unit>
